page.title: 11PEOPLES OPINIONS
page.content: In our survey about peoples' opinions it was thought that unemployment was the biggest problem for the local area, and the country. Many people thought that unequal sharing of the world's resources was the main problem for the world. Many people thought problems connected with travel were important.Some of these were poor road surfaces,inadequate bus services and car parking because of the increase in tourism. Many people were concerned about crime particularly in our local area and the country as a whole,probably due to unemployment. Two other problems mentioned were concerned with education and conservation. World issues of concern were connected with poverty, selfishness, greed and over population.Another problem was the threat of nuclear war.
